extendedInfo.description: Free Christmas Candles is a free App with 4 real candle in your Android devices without the risk of burn by the leakage of silk, you can turn it off and turn it on by clicking on it or shaking your device.This App supports all your devices Android, excellent for use at concerts, parties, family gatherings or religious, funerals, weddings, baptisms, memorials, churches, school, san giving dinner, under Christmas tree, anywhere.Surprise your friends by showing a real candle in your Android device, is free.Easy to use, only click to turn on and shake to turn off.Keywords; flame, fire, candle, candles, concert, music, arena, light, lite, lights, lites, religious, ceremony, wedding, weddings, shaking, shake, funeral, baptism, vigils, concerts, church, funerals, memorials, baptisms, santa claus, christenings, schools, cross, christian, jewish, jew, christ, jesus Christ, san giving, dinner, Christmas.
